oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The spade analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Munkholm, Lars J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soil
Soil biology
Soil quality
Soil tillage
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This method describes the present status of the soil tilth and to relate it to past management practices. Key criteria include soil texture, structure (layering, units, density, colour), compaction, anaerobism, root growth, soil fauna and decomposition of organic matter. A record form describing each property is completed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Munkholm, Lars J. (2005) The spade analysis. In: ISTRO Info, ISTRO. [In Press]
